# displayName

**Instance Property**

The name of the timecode source.

## Declaration

```swift
var displayName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This property provides a descriptive name of the timecode source, useful for display in user interfaces or logging.

## Inspecting the source

- **type**: The type of timecode source.
- **uuid**: A unique identifier for the timecode source.

items.description: A unique identifier for the timecode source.
